channel.title: Zeyu Jia on Ming Su | 苏命
channel.description: Recent content in Zeyu Jia on Ming Su | 苏命

item.title: Humic acid removal by gas–liquid interface discharge plasma: performance, mechanism and comparison to ozonation
Succession and interaction of surface and subsurface cyanobacterial blooms in oligotrophic/mesotrophic reservoirs: a case study in Miyun Reservoir
item.description: Highlights High light and nutrient at pre-bloom stage are essential for surface cyanobacteria. Surface cell decline enhanced underwater light thus promoted subsurface cyanobacteria. Subsurface cyanobacteria prefer to grow in shallow oligotrophic/deep eutrophic water.

item.title: Report of Qingcaosha Reservoir regarding the investigation on May 23, 2018
Report of odor problem of source water reservoir in East Tai Lake in June of 2018
